titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Matter of dignity [videorecording] / Michigan Education Association, in association with Pace and Partners and National Video Communications, Inc.

profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

did.unittitle: Matter of dignity [videorecording] / Michigan Education Association, in association with Pace and Partners and National Video Communications, Inc.

odd.head: Publication, Distribution, Etc.
odd.p: East Lansing, Mich. : Michigan Education Association, 1998.

archdesc.scopecontent: Various people associated with education address the role of teachers and the Michigan Education Association in the public education of youth in Michigan in the past and present.
